Summary Note:
Robert Lemaître Martin and the RM met at a financial seminar in Berlin. They attended several workshops together and exchanged ideas on market trends, which sparked a long-term professional relationship.
Robert Lemaître Martin is a 49 year old Operations Manager from Germany. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Robert Lemaître Martin is married to Alice. Robert and Alice have 1 child, named Inès.
Education Background:
Robert received his secondary school diploma from Lycée Gustave Eiffel in 1993.
Robert received his degree from IUT de Rennes in 1999.
He also pursued further higher education at University of Montpellier, graduating in 2004.
Occupation History:
Robert Lemaître Martin is a 49 year old Operations Manager from Germany. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Robert Lemaître Martin's first role was as a Drilling Engineer at E.ON SE, where he worked diligently from 2000 to 2001 to establish a strong reputation.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Reservoir Engineer at Uniper SE in 2002, further expanding his skill set.
From 2009 till now, he served as a Operations Manager at Wintershall DEA GmbH, solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 390000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has townhouse located in Hanover, worth 1040000 EUR.

In 2014, he received an inheritance of 140000 EUR from his late grandmother, who was a prominent Neurosurgeon, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In summary, Robert has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
